info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 22 at 6:02PM EDT until June 22 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON...EASTERN GREENE...SOUTHWESTERN FAYETTE...NORTHEASTERN MONONGALIA AND NORTHERN PRESTON COUNTIES... At 602 PM EDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms were located over Fredericktown-Millsboro, or 11 miles east of Waynesburg, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Morgantown, Uniontown, Waynesburg, California, Masontown, Brownsville, Fredericktown-Millsboro, Farmington, Fairdale, Jefferson Boro, Point Marion, and Brookhaven. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
